alert.note: Alert for La Salle (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 2:38PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central La Salle County through 315 PM CDT... At 237 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Grand Ridge, or near Ottawa, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ottawa, Marseilles, Seneca and Grand Ridge. Including the following interstate... I-80 between mile markers 97 and 102. This includes... Illini State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
